Damage: 5D '''Capsule''': Unlike previous Mu-class shuttles, the third variant was a general purpose shuttle used for when stealth was not a mission requirement. While only requiring two crew to pilot the shuttle, it could carry an entire platoon of Stormtroopers or Imperial Army troopers and their equipment. The twin fire-linked laser cannons were primarily for defensive purposes.
